page.description: Predefined editor for capturing signatures as Ink data

section.title: Video: Capturing Signatures using the SignatureInk Editor

description.p: A common requirement when using the FormView control is capturing a signature. Alpha Anywhere has a Signature control, but this control captures signatures as bitmaps and is not ideal for use in a FormView control. The Ink control is better suited for this use case.
In this video we show how a FormView control is configured to use the built-in SignatureInk editor.
